text: aye musalmaano! jab tum se kaha jaaye ke majliso mein zara koshaadgi payda karo, to tum jageh kushaada kardo, Allah tumhe koshaadgi dega, aur jab kaha jaaye ke uth kade ho jaao, to tum uth khade ho jaao, Allah ta’ala tum mein se un logo ke jo imaan laaye hai aur jo ilm diye gaye hai darje bulandh kar dega aur Allah ta’ala har us kaam se jo tum kar rahe ho (qoob) qabardaar hai
